app_descript:
App Name: Family Farm Adventure

Brief: Family Farm Adventure invites you to immerse yourself in a captivating blend of farm building, exploration, and puzzle-solving on a lush tropical island. Accompany the intrepid photographer Felicia and the shrewd archaeologist Toby on an enchanting quest brimming with mysteries, decoration delights, and farming fun.
